message: I propose dividing the money in a 70:30 ratio. This allows us both to have a reasonable share while considering the risk of inflation.

I propose a slight adjustment towards equality, suggesting a 51:49 split. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the need for compromise. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
